description: MainActivity.kt for an Android TV number guessing game. This file sets up the main user interface programmatically, including layout, focus navigation, and event handling, conforming to the TV-optimized experience using focusable controls and DPAD navigation.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main Android Activity for the number guessing game, managing UI setup, focus navigation, and interacting with the GameViewModel.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the UI components, sets up the game layout, binds view model observers, and configures focus navigation for D-Pad control.

methods.name: setLinearNavigation
methods.description: Configures vertical focus navigation across rows in a LinearLayout grid to facilitate logical TV navigation.

methods.name: setRowNavigation
methods.description: Configures horizontal focus navigation within a single row of buttons.

methods.name: View.idOrAssign
methods.description: Ensures a view has a valid focus id, assigning one if necessary.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts integer values to pixel density units for layout margins and sizes.

methods.name: buildTvButton
methods.description: Creates styled focusable buttons suitable for TV navigation with focus states and rounded corners.

methods.name: playClick
methods.description: Plays a click sound effect for user feedback on button press.

methods.name: focusableSurfaceBackground
methods.description: Builds a background drawable for focusable inputs.

methods.name: tvButtonBackground
methods.description: Creates a state-list drawable with different backgrounds for button states: normal, focused, pressed.

methods.name: darken
methods.description: Darkens a provided color by a specified factor for visual feedback.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles back button press to close the activity.
